turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, tacos sound good, but I'm trying to eat healthy. Is Veracruz All Natural actually *healthy*? Or is it just a marketing thing?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a great question! Veracruz All Natural does use fresh ingredients and offers some very healthy options, like their migas with avocado. They also offer smoothies which are on the healthier side. I'd say it depends on your specific dietary needs and how you customize your order. I can provide nutritional information for specific menu items if you want.

turns.speaker: user
